content: When moving files between Linux systems, file ownership becomes a nightmare. User 'appuser' is UID 1000 on Server A but 1005 on Server B. Applications can't access files because numeric UIDs don't match, requiring manual permission fixes every time.

content: Morgan Stanley hired movers to decommission data centers in 2016. [1] Hard drives with 15 million customer records were auctioned online—unencrypted. [2] $35 million in fines. Most devices never recovered.
excerpt: Morgan Stanley hired movers to decommission data centers in 2016. <a href='https://techcrunch.com/2022/09/21/morgan-stanley-hard-drives-data-breach/'...

content: Stolen servers remain compromised if encryption is incomplete

content: Decommissioning procedures often skip encryption steps entirely

content: File deletion doesn't erase data just removes entries

content: Database backups frequently stored unencrypted in secure locations

content: Compliance explicitly requires encryption at rest for data
excerpt: Compliance explicitly requires encryption at rest for data

content: Each repository encrypted with its own password. Every file, container, configuration, database, and backup protected. Only you hold the per-repo encryption key. Stolen hardware = worthless encrypted blobs.

content: You can't manage what you can't measure <small class='subtitle-attribution'>— Peter Drucker</small>

content: Infrastructure migrations happen in stages. Legacy systems left during transitions fall off audit radar. When auditors ask 'What's in production?' and 'Who accessed what?', you can't answer for systems thought decommissioned. Incomplete migrations create blind spots—systems holding data, vulnerable, unmonitored.
excerpt: Infrastructure migrations happen in stages. Legacy systems left during transitions fall off audit radar. When auditors ask 'What's in production?' and...

content: Oracle Health inherited legacy Cerner servers from a 2022 acquisition. In January 2025, attackers breached an unmigrated system. [1] Undetected for a month—no longer monitored. 262,831 patient records stolen. [2] The breach happened on unaudited infrastructure.
excerpt: Oracle Health inherited legacy Cerner servers from a 2022 acquisition. In January 2025, attackers breached an unmigrated system. <a href='https://www....

content: No audit trail means no proof what happened
excerpt: No audit trail means no proof what happened

content: Every operation logged: who deployed, who accessed what, when changes were made. Complete visibility into your infrastructure. content: Infrastructure migrations require temporary security relaxation. Contractors disable firewalls to 'speed up the process.' Encryption bypassed for performance. Temporary windows become permanent attack vectors. Protected data gets exposed for hours or days. Attackers target migration windows when security controls weaken.
excerpt: Infrastructure migrations require temporary security relaxation. Contractors disable firewalls to 'speed up the process.' Encryption bypassed for perf...

content: Keepnet Labs hired a contractor to migrate its database in March 2020. Contractor disabled firewall for 10 minutes. [1] 5 billion records indexed. Database exposed 24 hours. [2] A cybersecurity firm's migration exposed billions.
excerpt: Keepnet Labs hired a contractor to migrate its database in March 2020. Contractor disabled firewall for 10 minutes. <a href='https://www.verdict.co.uk...
